title: Flipped Learning-Based Pre-Service Physics Teachersâ€™ Question Generation and Analysis Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics concepts and foundational pedagogical theories
context.additional_context: Learners responsible for developing mathematics-integrated physics education programs as corporate training managers/leaders

learning_goals: In a flipped learning environment, learners can generate analytical questions about learning content using three or more question types (conceptual, application, experimental, etc.)
Learners can evaluate the difficulty level of generated questions in four stages (low-medium-medium-high-high) based on peer feedback
Through project-based assessment, learners can propose two or more question-generation strategies applicable to real educational settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
